entrance: ^This looks creepy enough to be the right place.
courtyard: ^Yeesh... This place could use a facelift.
bushes: ^The bushes look like they could use some TLC.
fountain: ^I wonder who's paying the water bill.
placard: ^'Rich Richardson.' Who would name their child that?
sidetable: ^It's a rotting sidetable with a leather journal resting on top.
portrait_know: ^'Now I can put a name to the face.'
display: ^A coud of dust erupts as you swipe your hand across the display case.
^Inside you see a bronze statue of Lady Justice.
snoop: ^You pick it up; the leather is smooth.
^The aged and yellow pages are covered with passages written in hurried cursive.
^A few sentences stick out to you.
^"...weak are those who do not repent..."
no_snoop: ^'Creepy books don't usually lead to good things.'
